name: places/ChIJGUYyeQP2wokR3ld24kb5LU4
formattedAddress: 1745 Lexington Ave # 1, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1745 Lexington Ave # 1, New York, NY 10029-3568, USA

originalText.text:
Just need to say how much I appreciate the team here at this establishment. Very nice, and Dr. Salcedo is fantastic. He genuinely cares about keeping your mouth healthy and at its best, and therefore won’t charge you an arm and a leg for the services provided. His prices are beyond fair.

I was seen quickly and was able to make an appointment for the same day, thankfully. They worked with me as I needed to come back again for more services in the same day. I think I’ve found my permanent dentist!! Definitely will recommend him to others.

Thank you!

text.text:

originalText.text:
Dr. Salcedo is the best I have met. I have been going for years to him and never dissatisfied. He and his staff makes you feel like family. Dr. Salcedo is a very compassionate and kindhearted physician. I recently moved to another state and I still come to NY for him.

Three weeks ago a crown fell off and I had no choice to visit a dentist in my home state and the quote was over 5,000.00 I almost cried. My husband told me leave now and wait till I get a second opinion. Thankfully, I was able to schedule with Dr. Salcedo last minute in my trip to NY and my charge was $100.00. I am so grateful that we still have caring Dentist like him.

originalText.text: This review is long long overdue. I've been seeing Dr Salcedo for 10 years and my mother 20 years plus. Not sure where to start but an excellent dentist and the best I have ever known. Being tried many many different dentist one can never find anyone more professional, honest and caring. Dental and office staff also deserve a 10. Don't look elsewhere'

Being tried many many different dentist one can never find anyone more professional, honest and caring. Dental and office staff also deserve a 10. Don't look elsewhere'

originalText.text: Dr. Salcedo, is such a professional, he makes you feel like family, he's comforting, caring and always gives his all. Wonderful staff, wonderful Dr. And amazing experience. I'll wait as long as i have for My Dr❤. I recommend 10000%

text.text: Dr. Salcedo, is such a professional, he makes you feel like family, he's comforting, caring and always gives his all. Wonderful staff, wonderful Dr. And amazing experience. I'll wait as long as i have for My Dr❤. I recommend 10000%

originalText.text: Had a great experience at this dentist. The front desk (Jessica) is excellent and was able to fit me in same day with no wait, all with a wonderful demeanor. The dental assistant (don't know her name) was  pleasant and efficient and made me feel comfortable while she did my xrays. I was then seen by  Dr. Spessa (sp?) and she was very thorough with my cleaning and explained everything in detail to me about her findings. Last but not least, Dr. Salcedo reviewed Dr. Spessa's findings and reinforced Dr. Spressa's findings. They all have a great working relationship and it's reflected in how they treat their patients. Thank you for seeing me last minute and not making it feel like a rush job. I will be back.
